edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff
Class EditableTextLine

java.lang.Object
  edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.TextLine
      edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.EditableTextLine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Editable
public class EditableTextLine
extends TextLine
implements Editable

The EditableTextLine class extend from the class TextLine and implements the interface Editable. It contains the bodies of the methods from Editable and also some constructors that call from the super class.

insert

public void insert(int index,
                   java.lang.String fragment)
            throws TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException
This method allows a string to be inserted into _TextLine at a specific index. If the index is out of bounds, the an exception will be thrown.

Specified by:
insert in interface Editable
Parameters:
index - where the string will be inserted in _TextLine
fragment - the string that will be inserted in _TextLine
Throws:
TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException(index) - thrown when the index requested is out of bounds
TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException

replace

public void replace(int start,
                    int end,
                    java.lang.String fragment)
             throws TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException
Remove characters from start to end, then call insert method to insert the fragment.

Specified by:
replace in interface Editable
Parameters:
start - index at which to start replacing at
end - index at which to end the replacing at
fragment - the string to insert into the _TextLine
Throws:
TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException - is thrown if index is out of bounds
